evidence.claim: Anova Enterprises handles HIPAA compliance in their applications.
They utilize FHIR standards for data interoperability in healthcare.
The use of X12 for handling electronic transactions is mentioned in their documentation.
Integration patterns employing EDI for healthcare transactions are outlined in their engineering resources.
Anova emphasizes security measures in line with HIPAA regulations on their developer page.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 or API-based automation use cases found on the website.
